title.romaji: Dragon Ball: Shen Long no Densetsu
title.english: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
title.native: ドラゴンボール 神龍の伝説

synonyms: Dragon Ball: La Légende de Shéron
Dragonball: Die Legende von Shen Long
Dragon Ball - La leggenda delle sette sfere
Dragon Ball - La leggenda del drago Shenron
Dragon Ball: The Legend of Shenlong
description:
A retelling of Dragon Ball's origins, this is a different version of the meeting of Goku, Bulma, Oolong, and Yamucha. They are all looking for the dragon balls for different reasons when they cross paths with an evil king named Gourmeth, who is also looking for the dragon balls.

(Source: Anime News Network)
